task_description:
Project Foundation & Core Data Model

1. Enum 정의 (Gender, ActivityLevel, MealType, ExerciseType, Intensity, FoodSource, GoalType, SleepStatus, QuantityUnit, Constants)
2. Utility Services (DateUtils - 02:00 수면 경계, ValidationService, Date+Extensions, Decimal+Extensions, Formatters)
3. Domain Entities (User, BodyRecord, MetabolismSnapshot, Food, FoodRecord, ExerciseRecord, SleepRecord, DailyLog, Goal)
4. Core Data Entity Extensions
5. Unit Tests (DateUtils, ValidationService, SleepStatus)

참고: @docs/04_ERD.md, @docs/02_FEATURE_SPEC.md, @docs/06_ALGORITHM.md
